attributes.action: Allow the re-introduction of Christian Assembly & prayer in all schools in the U.K. & her protectorates.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is time to reclaim this nation's Christian heritage..... the very foundation of British society, the judicial system & our once-proud education system & health service.
There is a war being fought for the very soul of this nation and one of the main battle-grounds is our schools.
